attributes.action: Total repeal of the COVID-19 lock-down and restriction measures.
attributes.additional_details:
If these measure are not ended now they could drag on indefinitely until we will have no economy left, the public well-being decreases to a point where it’ll become a much bigger strain on the NHS though cancers, alcohol and drug abuse, suicides, mental health and other afflictions caused and/ or exacerbated from the “lock-down” measures such as unemployment or failing businesses. 

Social distancing should stay in place but be entirely the decision of the individual except in the workplace
attributes.background:
The general public must be allowed to make up their own minds and assess their own risks with regards to travel, meeting others, shopping and to run their businesses without government hindrance from the COVID-19 restrictions.

The time for being locked down is over its time to go back outside.
